subject: Soccer
Women and Girls
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: A vast majority of countries still do not wholly support women’s soccer, but if Colombia defeats the United States on Monday it could signal a broader victory beyond just one game.
snippet: A vast majority of countries still do not wholly support women’s soccer, but if Colombia defeats the United States on Monday it could signal a broader victory beyond just one game.
